info.author: Jitbit
info.description:
Jitbit Helpdesk widget plugin
-----------------------------

This is a tiny plugin that allows integrating Jitbit Helpdesk into an existing python web-application or a website. It places the JS-code onto your webpages that displays an interactive support widget to your visitors.

Your website visitors/users will be able to submit support tickets right from within your web-application or a website.

You still require an either on-premises or hosted installation of the Jitbit app (available free on the website, the trial version does not expire so you can use it as long as you need).
info.license: Free for the python package , proprietary for the helpdesk app
info.name: Jitbit-Helpdesk
info.summary: Jitbit Helpdesk Ticketing system plugin for your python webapp
